text: FilmFreeway is a Canadian website for people who make movies. They use it to submit their movies to hundreds of movies festivals around the world. It was the official sponsor of the 2020 Orlando cinema festival. ==Partners== Partial list of partners: *Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences *Sundance *Doc NYC *Raindance *Slamdance ==Other websites== * Category:2014 establishments in Canada Category:Canadian websites Category:Movie industry Category:Companies of Canada
title: FilmFreeway
